name: MC Marcinho
description: '''Márcio André Nepomuceno Garcia''' (11 November 1977 – 26 August 2023), better known as '''MC Marcinho''', was a Brazilian singer and composer of [[funk melody]]. He was famous for such hits as "Rap do Solitário", "Princesa", "Glamurosa", "Garota nota 100", and "Tudo é festa". During the height of his career, he was dubbed the "Prince of Funk".
